Integrations

To help you getting started with using Zynk we have a series of example workflows covering common applications we integrate with.

  • Amazon Submit Feeds
  • Amazon to Sage Integration
  • BigCommerce to Sage 50 Integration
  • Channel Advisor to Sage 50 Integration
  • Core Commerce to Sage 50 Integration
  • CSV to Sage Integration
  • Developer Connector
  • Easy Webstore to Sage 50 Integration
  • eBay to Sage to UK Integration
  • Excel to Sage Integration
  • Export Invoice as PDF from Sage 50
  • FileHelpers - Master Detail Example
  • FTP to Sage 50 Integration
  • JSON and XML Integration
  • Magento to Sage Integration
  • Sage 50 Stock Records to Magento Products
  • Salesforce to Sage 50 Integration
  • Sending Invoices and Statements from Sage 50
  • SFTP to Sage 50 Integration
  • Shopify to Sage 50 Integration
  • SmartDebit to Sage 50 Transaction Import
  • Sugar CRM to Sage 50 Integration
  • Traffic Live to Sage 50 UK Integration
  • Website Script Based Integration
